  "shows_prec p (a :: 'a poly) (r @ s) = shows_prec p a r @ s"

lemma show_law_poly [show_law_simps]:
  "shows_prec p (a :: 'a poly) (r @ s) = shows_prec p a r @ s"

goal (1 subgoal):
